奉.definition: to offer (tribute); to present respectfully (to superior, ancestor, deity etc); to esteem; to revere; to believe in (a religion); to wait upon; to accept orders (from superior)

奉公克己.definition: self-restraint and devotion to public duties (idiom); selfless dedication; to serve the public interest wholeheartedly

奉公守法.definition: to carry out official duties and observe the law

奉勸.definition: may I offer a bit of advice

奉命.definition: to receive orders; to follow orders; to act under orders

奉天.definition: old name for Shenyang 瀋陽|沈阳 in modern Liaoning province

奉承.definition: to fawn on; to flatter; to ingratiate oneself; flattery

奉承討好.definition: to curry favor; to get the desired outcome by flattery

奉新.definition: Fengxin county in Yichun 宜春, Jiangxi

奉新縣.definition: Fengxin county in Yichun 宜春, Jiangxi

奉為圭臬.definition: to take as a guiding principle (idiom)

奉獻.definition: to offer respectfully; to consecrate; to dedicate; to devote

奉申賀敬.definition: polite congratulations (i.e. on a greeting card)

奉祀.definition: to worship; to pay respects to (a deity, ancestor etc); (of a shrine or temple) to be dedicated to (a deity, ancestor etc)

奉節.definition: Fengjie, a county in Chongqing 重慶|重庆[Chong2qing4]

奉節縣.definition: Fengjie, a county in Chongqing 重慶|重庆[Chong2qing4]

奉若神明.definition: to honor sb as a God (idiom); to revere; to worship; to deify; to make a holy cow of sth; to put sb on a pedestal

奉贈.definition: (honorific) to present; to give as a present

奉還.definition: to return with thanks; to give back (honorific)

奉陪.definition: (honorific) to accompany; to keep sb company

奉養.definition: to look after (elderly parents); Taiwan pr. [feng4yang4]
